mapper.select: SELECT recruit_id,email,title,content,name,skill,gender,edu,work_type,work_day,work_area, business_part,incharge,tel,min_career,max_career,min_age,max_age,start_date,end_date, min_salary,max_salary,people_count,readcount,reg_date,last_date,r FROM ( select recruit_id,email,title,content,name,skill,gender,edu,work_type,work_day,work_area, business_part,incharge,tel,start_date,end_date,min_career,max_career,min_age,max_age, min_salary,max_salary,people_count,readcount,reg_date,last_date, rownum r FROM FJ_RECRUIT ORDER BY last_date desc ) WHERE r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
